original_text: When you heard the message that I had spoken, you were very upset. You made yourself humble to respect me. You tore your clothes and you wept. You did that when you heard how I would punish this place and the people who live here. Because you became so upset, I have heard your prayer.
korean_text: 내가 이 곳과 그 주민을 가리켜 말한 것을 네가 듣고 마음이 연약하여 하나님 앞 곧 내 앞에서 겸손하여 옷을 찢고 통곡하였으므로 나도 네 말을 들었노라 여호와가 말하였느니라

sentences.original_text: When you heard the message that I had spoken
You made yourself humble to respect me
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 나를 존중하기 위해 스스로를 겸손하게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: You did that when you heard how I would punish this place
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 내가 이 곳을 어떻게 벌할지 들었을 때 그렇게 했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the people who live here
